subject: Subprime Mortgage Crisis
Athletics and Sports
United States Economy
Automobile Racing
Bicycles and Bicycling
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The economic crisis made its first obvious mark on American professional sports Friday when a major cycling event and Nascar announced substantial changes because of financial woes.
snippet: The economic crisis made its first obvious mark on American professional sports Friday when a major cycling event and Nascar announced substantial changes because of financial woes.
